Trenton.Cass Street (River Line station): Cass Street is a station on the River Line light rail system, located on Cass Street at Route 129 in Trenton, New Jersey. It is very nearly directly across Route 129 from Trenton State Prison. Arm & Hammer Park is located five blocks away down Cass Street, while both the Hamilton Avenue stop and Sun National Bank Center are located a few blocks north on Route 129.
